Plot: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.
Title: Runaway Jury
Writer: John Grisham (novel), Brian Koppelman (screenplay), David Levien (screenplay), Rick Cleveland (screenplay), Matthew Chapman (screenplay)
Actors: John Cusack, Gene Hackman, Dustin Hoffman, Rachel Weisz
tomatoConsensus: An implausible but entertaining legal thriller.
